main.name: Asbat El Khairi
main.bio: A double Master degree holder in Computer Science and enthusiastic Information Security Researcher with a special focus on applying Machine Learning techniques and algorithms within the domains of Phishing, Malware Analysis/Detection, Intrusion Detection, Open-Source Vulnerability Analysis, et cetera. Also, I am an adaptive and fast-learning person with a demonstrated experience in Information Security and Software Engineering. Currently, I am working as a Cybersecurity analyst at Siemens, analyzing and evaluating security vulnerabilities in third-party software.
main.intro: Information Security Researcher, Cybersecurity Analyst, and Android Developer Entrepreneur based in Munich
